title: WATCH: Lana Del Rey covers Ariana Grande's 'Break Up with Your Girlfriend, I'm Bored'
text:
WATCH: Lana Del Rey covers Ariana Grande's 'Break Up with Your Girlfriend, I'm Bored'

Cape Town - Lana Del Rey was the guest on BBC Radio 1's Live Lounge on Monday morning.

During her live session, the American singer – who recently released an album titled Norman Fucking Rockwell! - covered Ariana Grande's hit song Break Up with Your Girlfriend I'm Bored.

Speaking about the cover, Lana told host Clara Amfo "I thought about sending her a screenshot of a list of preferred covers I was sent, which had about seven of her songs on it, so she wouldn't just think I was a mega-fan."

During the cover, Lana sat astride a chair and read the lyrics from her phone which had a cover emblazoned with cherries.

WATCH THE COVER HERE:

Ariana Grande and Lana Del Rey will soon be heard together, alongside Miley Cyrus, on the theme tune to the upcoming Charlie's Angels reboot.

SEE MILEY'S TWEET ABOUT THAT COLLABORATION HERE:
description: The 'Video Games' singer was the guest on BBC Radio 1's Live Lounge and performed her version of the hit song by Ariana Grande.
